com.deezer.sdk.player.networkcheck

Interface NetworkStateChecker

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    com.deezer.sdk.player.networkcheck.AbstractNetworkChecker, com.deezer.sdk.player.networkcheck.SimpleNetworkStateChecker, WifiAndMobileNetworkStateChecker, WifiOnlyNetworkStateChecker

    public interface NetworkStateChecker
    Defines the behavior of a component able to monitor network state. Different implementations will provide the network state using different network connections (either wifi only, or wifi & mobile). Network state is checked and cached, then made available via a getter method. When network status changes, an event is triggered to a potentially registered listener.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Checks the network state and cache it.

        Sets a network state listener that will be notified of state changes.

        Return the state of the network.
        Returns:
